detail_desc: Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood and zip down the front. Lined.
Soft suede loafers with a moccasin seam at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved top in airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey. V-neck with a twisted trim.
Body in soft, patterned satin with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck. Seam at the hips and a jersey lower section with press-studs at the crotch.
Pile jacket with a large collar, zip down the front, discreet side pockets and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
3/4-length leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.
Cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and ankle-length legs with sewn-in creases.
Long-sleeved body in glittery mesh with overlocked edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Leather jacket in a straight style with a detachable tie belt. Collar, hook-and-eye fastening, concealed zip down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Chest pocket and two flap pockets. Lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in soft jersey. Long-sleeved, printed top with raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Sleeveless blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, a round neckline and buttons down the front. Flounces down the front that continue back over the shoulders and a seam at the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in a textured organic cotton weave with an elasticated waist and adjustable straps that cross and fasten with concealed buttons at the back. Lined.
Fine-knit moccasins with soft terry inside, imitation leather trims and soft suede soles.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back, narrow shoulder straps and wide elastication at the hem. Light support.
Body in stretch jersey with a V-neck and decorative knot detail at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the crotch.
Knee-length dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck and gathers at the shoulders. 3/4-length sleeves, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a detachable tie-belt. Unlined.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Hat in a soft rib knit with an appliqué on the turned-up edge.

Water-repellent, softshell gloves with a soft fleece lining and reinforced palms in imitation leather. Elastication at the wrists, reflective details and a plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. The tops of the thumb and index finger are made from touchscreen-compatible material.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a concealed button-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined, textured, patterned swimsuit.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated waist and flared legs.
Earrings in textured metal with a heart-shaped pendant. Length 4.5 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft, slub jersey made from organic cotton with buttons down the front and flutter sleeves. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y), and narrow elastication at the hems.
Calf-length skirt woven in a cotton blend with pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt and concealed side pockets. Unlined.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with short legs and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend in various designs.
Wrapover top in jersey with a V-neck, seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves.
Short, sleeveless dress in velour with a V-neck at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with frills down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Straight-style, knee-length dress in jersey made from a linen and viscose blend with a deep V-neck, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Sleeveless dress in tulle with floral appliqués at the top, buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and flared, layered tulle skirt. Satin lining. Matching hairband in a double layer of jersey with floral appliqués on the front and covered elastication at the back.
Rounded collar in a cotton weave embellished with glass beads and embroidery. Fastening with a spherical button at the front.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a decorative knot detail.
Cotton trainers with closed lacing and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Acetate earrings with rectangular pendants. Length 4.6 cm.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist and an adjustable belt with metal D-rings at the front. Pleats at the top, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide, ankle-length legs.

Fully lined cargo trousers in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Flap front, back and leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and shaped, tapered legs. Jersey lining.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved all-in-one suit in soft organic cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, buttons at the front of the shoulders, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs, and full feet.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset, lace trims and cutaway coverage at the back.

Short dress in pleated jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck at the front and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Gathered seams on the shoulders, short sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in thin sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gently fitted, double-breasted jacket in sturdy, patterned jersey with narrow notch lapels and flap front pockets. Unlined.
Jacket in patterned cotton twill with a detachable hood, zip down the front, front pockets and elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Trousers in a soft cashmere knit with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.

Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow shoulder straps and gathered elastication at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Lined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a square neckline front and back and a slit at the back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Wide top in scuba fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood and dropped shoulders. Long sleeves with a sewn-on printed woven fabric band on one sleeve and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with sequined sections. Collar, buttons down the front, a V-shaped yoke, flap chest pockets with a button and discreet side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Soft jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, imitation suede braided belt and fake fly and press-stud. Decorative fabric appliqués at the front, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless top in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a tie detail at the front of the hem.
Leather monkstraps with a reinforced toe and a wide, adjustable tab with two metal buckles. Leather linings and insoles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini. Flounced top with narrow shoulder straps, one with a small metal decoration, and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with a decorative bow at each side.

Gently fitted, padded parka in woven fabric with velvet details. Padded, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, zipped front pockets and concealed elastication at the cuffs. Lined. Polyester filling.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a deep neckline at the front and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a chest pocket and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Sandals in imitation leather with a padded appliqué on the foot strap and a hook and loop fastening. Imitation leather linings and insoles and transparent soles with motion-activated flashing lights.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, open chest pockets and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Metal rings in various designs.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Socks knitted in a soft, patterned cotton blend with elasticated tops.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
Short shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
5-pocket, low-rise shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Hi-tops with a padded edge, hook and loop tab at the top, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
